title: Little Scavenger
description:
■ Roguelike : Little Scavenger has a diverse and replayable world and permanent death as a reason to stay cautious.

■ Isometric top-down combat : The game takes inspiration from games like Diablo, Hades, and Dead Cells in the design of its combat.

■ Weapons and loot : Play with an abundance of weapons and tools that affects your playstyle in every run.

title: On the Run: Rogue Heroes Demo
description:
Awaken your powers and save your friends! Uncover the secrets that the military has been hiding about Activated people, about your family, and about you.

On the Run: Rogue Heroes is an interactive teenage-superpower novel by Alyssa N. Vaughn. It’s entirely text-based, 200,000 words and hundreds of choices, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

For decades, everyone with special powers like super-strength or flight has been forced into lifelong conscription in W.I.N.G.S.: the Weaponized Individual National Guardian Services. Most of this military branch’s activities are secret—except for the daring exploits of heroes like Ms. Midnight, Phantom Phaeton, and Sergeant Smash.

You and your older sister grew up living with your grandmother, who cared for you, provided for you, and sheltered you from the truth. She knows what they do at W.I.N.G.S., she knows what happened to your parents, and she knows about the deadly genetic disease that you and your sister both carry.

Now, you and your sister have finally Activated your powers, W.I.N.G.S has arrested and conscripted your sister, and you've fled with your grandmother, on the run from psionic government agents with abilities just as powerful as yours.

But you’re not alone! There are people out there trying to fight back against W.I.N.G.S., people who could be your friend—or more than friends. There's Micah, a long-lost friend with shoulder-length locs and a big secret to protect. Alex, a pickpocket/con-artist has illusion powers and a lot of eye makeup. Then there's Knockout, a vigilante with a red-brown ponytail and homemade costume, including a mask and cape.

While your scrappy little group races against time to save your sister and yourselves, your own powers are growing stronger every day. Outrun cars on the highway with super-speed, pull down telephone poles with your super-strength, let out supersonic cries that can shatter glass—or just turn invisible and sneak away from it all. You’ll need every bit of your power and your smarts as you uncover secrets that could change the lives of every Activated person on earth.

  • • Play as male, female, or nonbinary; gay, straight, bi, or asexual.
  • Choose your portfolio of powers: super-strength, super-speed, heightened senses, supersonic shouts, or invisibility!
  • Befriend or romance a childhood sweetheart, a scrappy con-artist runaway, or a powered vigilante with big golden-retriever energy.
  • Discover the truth about your family and rebuild your relationship with your long-lost mother—or leave it all behind and seek support only with your friends.
  • Fight back against the government’s control of Activated people, join their secret organization and become even more powerful yourself, or make peace between opposing factions.

Who will you trust? Who are your parents? Who will you date?

title: Don't Wake Me Up Demo
description:
You’re trapped in a malfunctioning virtual reality with no memories. No memories, except of every video game you’ve ever played. Jack into a wild night in a virtual world you’ll never remember.

Armed with puns, pop culture, and a sharp dose of sarcasm, can you muddle your way through levels of satirical video game pastiches, back to reality?

Adventure through virtual worlds alongside a delusional gamer, an actual emo vampire (who really wishes he wasn’t an emo vampire), a poet from outer space, and a dashing princess in shining armor, among others! And perhaps, just perhaps, learn a bit too much about the kind of person you are when the real world isn’t watching.

A satire of the trapped-in-a-video-game genre, and a tragicomedy on the theme of dating sims.

Don’t Wake Me Up is a 400,000-word interactive novel about love in video games, where your choices control the story. Entirely text-based, and driven by your imagination. It is written by Baudelaire Welch, a professional game screenwriter currently working as a companion character designer for RPGs.

  • Play as nonbinary, male, female, straight or queer.
  • Travel through 6 worlds inspired by different video game genres
  • Wield a weaponised top hat
  • Rack your brains in a spaceship escape level inspired by old-school adventure games
  • Compete in a classical music-themed monster truck rally
  • Lose yourself in a cyberpunk casino
  • Date the Ultimate Video Game Fanservice Vampire
  • Or, date the Ultimate Video Game ‘Best Girl’ Waifu
  • A period piece honed in early 2010s internet cringe
  • Bifurcates entirely halfway through the game based on your love interest.

Sometimes true love is a wrong dialogue choice.

title: SUPER 56 Soundtrack
description: Experience the dynamic, genre-bending soundtrack of SUPER 56!

title: Quebec Mortis Soundtrack
description: Game music made with pico8 editor. The music is included in the horror game quebec mortis and others tracks will eventually be part of the game.

title: Echoes of Madness
description:
Immerse yourself in the renewed terror of Echoes of Madness, where every shadow and whisper hides unimaginable secrets. Eighty years after the inauguration of the Greenview Psychiatric Hospital, Alex Turner, a private investigator turned head of security, faces the horrors that lurk in this unsettling sanatorium. Hired by a mysterious benefactor, Alex must unravel the truth behind the disappearances and deaths that plague the place. What he discovers is just the tip of the iceberg in a chilling story that intertwines life and death.




Delve into the disturbed mind of Greenview and uncover the darkest secrets hidden behind its walls.




Monitor the cameras, observe anomalies, manage the center's staff, and maintain control of vital systems, both of the sanatorium and yourself.




Enjoy a sound and visual environment that will make you feel every shiver. Experience an oppressive and realistic atmosphere that will completely immerse you.




Get caught up in a narrative that will push you to the edge of your fears and challenge your sanity.



Are you ready to face your worst nightmares? Echoes of Madness awaits you at Greenview. Surviving your watch is just the beginning.

title: Block The Monster
description:
Introduction to the game

The way I make it, the way I do it! A game on the square block!

Storytelling-oriented 3D tower defense with multiple routes and strategies!
Turn the tide of the battle by deploying a powerful hero.

How many waves can we hold out until the defense collapses and breaks down?
See through the enemy's numbers first and catch them off guard.

It takes you to a fantasy world filled with immersive stories and unique characters.
Be the main character of the adventure in the fantasy world.
Fight realistic battles, carve out the fate of the fantasy world, and write a story.
We invite you into the rich storytelling.




Game Features

A tower defense game in which users design their own paths to enemies.
The goal is to build towers to defeat enemies and gather resources, just like regular defense games.
With sufficient resources, you can confront the swarm of monsters.



Both friendly and enemy characters are very cute and cute graphics.
We're going to solve the Tower Defense game in 3D graphics like a fairytale fantasy
It's much more interesting and can be enjoyed casually.

Casual design and difficulty.
We welcome the challenges of masters who are tired of the existing casual defense games.




How to play it

Stop incoming waves and build and upgrade new towers > with the money you earn.
The player places the tower in a square block in the shape of a checkerboard
It's a game that prevents monsters and enemy attacks.

Each tower has a different range and attack method
You should also consider these points and use them efficiently when designing a road.

Towers have attack characteristics that defense users will be familiar with, making them easy to adapt to.
Enemies that get stronger by wave, towers that get stronger as they upgrade accordingly, etc
It has all the key elements that a defense game needs to have.




Synopsis

Mouslin and colleagues head into the woods after the trail of the undead.
They save villagers who are attacked by the undead in the woods.
Mouslin and his friends have come from the villagers who have saved him
You hear an unfortunate rumor that the villagers don't go to the graveyard and come back.
Knowing this, Mouslin and his colleagues head to the cemetery in curiosity and worry...

Yuria and Blondina combine divine power with powerful magic
Performs a powerful seal ritual that can suppress the power of the undead.
In the meantime, Attila searched for Rakutan's whereabouts in the cemetery,
Get information about maps and rituals of temples.
Attila immediately reports to Muslin, informing him that Rakutan's ceremony will take place at the temple.
They head to the temple, fighting a fierce battle against the demons inside the temple
He's making his way to the depths of the temple...

title: Polygon Fantasy Battle Simulator
description:
Welcome to Polygon Fantasy Battle Simulator, the most colorful medieval fantasy battle simulator in existence! Throw tens of thousands of soldiers into battle, enjoy the show, or take direct control of one of them to prove your valor!

Features

  • Ultra high performance crowd rendering system, allowing up to 100,000+ characters
  • Take direct control of any unit at any time!
  • True combat system with combos, light and heavy attacks, parrying and blocking
  • 8 different factions with a large variety of units to choose from
  • Devastating giant monsters (controllable as well!)

title: Songs of Steel: Hispania
description:
Lead your people to victory and make history: Relive the confrontation that took place, from 153 BC to 133 BC, between the relentless Roman Republic and the brave Celtiberian people of Numantia.

Choose your side and immerse yourself in a system of classic combat strategy and tactics mechanics based on positioning, flanking, and covering, in-battle missions, and decision-making, through battles and cinematic with powerful hand-drawn illustrations.

Manage your resources and skilfully mobilize your troops in challenging settings, from dense forests to ancient cities and majestic mountains, taking advantage of the environment and weather to defeat far more powerful armies.

Every choice you make will resonate in the narrative. Face moral dilemmas, make political decisions, and guide your people into an uncertain future.

Explore this war event through hand-made illustrations, capturing the beauty and brutality of the time. Each stroke will immerse you more in the past, making you feel the intensity of each battle and the emotional burden of each choice.

Meet great figures of the Numantia War such as the great Roman general Publius Cornelius Scipio and the fierce Celtiberian warriors Rhetogenes, Megara, Ambo, and Leuco, who played a fundamental role in a turbulent era of conquests and wars. His legacy and decisions will accompany you as you enter a world full of challenges and change. Are you ready to follow in his footsteps and become part of Hispania’s history?

  • Live historical confrontations and forge new paths with two full campaigns to choose from, featuring battles and historical figures from a war that lasted two decades.

  • Experience the intensity of decision-making and its impact on combat and history. In-battle missions are a real challenge, where objectives can change in the blink of an eye. Prepare to adapt and make crucial strategic decisions in real-time.

  • Strategy for everyone, from beginners to veterans. Immerse yourself in a strategic combat system that perfectly balances tactical depth with universal accessibility.

  • Experience a complete combat system based on positioning, flanking, and covering as you face challenging scenarios, from dense forests to ancient cities and majestic mountains.

  • With each battle, your units will evolve, improving their skills and acquiring new ones to strengthen your army. Outside the battlefield, wisely manage your resources to upgrade your troops' equipment—key to surviving one more day of war.

  • Use every resource at your disposal to defeat armies bigger than your own; in "Songs of Steel: Hispania", your strategic skill is the key to success.

  • Meet historical figures such as Rhetogenes, Scipio, Megara, Ambo and Leuco with hand-drawn illustrations that capture the beauty and brutality of that era.

Your skill and decisions will mark the fate of your people!

title: Born In Reverie
description:
Take up arms against the Beasts with impactful and gratifying back-and-forth combat. Use the Guardians' diverse abilities and skills to land exciting Critical Hits, causing the party to enter the Inspired state for 3 turns where they are faster, deal more damage, and are resilient to negative statuses. You'll know you've landed a Critical Hit when a character cuts in, and the music ramps up in volume and intensity!

Gameplay Features

  • An Evolution of Critical Hits in Turn-Based Combat

  • Unique character Skills and Guardian Abilities

  • Class Progression and unlocking New Classes

  • Dynamic Music in battle

  • Dungeon Exploration

Experience the stories of a people born in perpetual servitude towards one goal: defeating the Beasts. For as long as we can remember, the Beasts have risen from the mountains, and for as long as we can remember, we have deigned to destroy them. With a seemingly never-ending struggle, what can keep you going?

World and Narrative

  • A Modern take on RPG storytelling from a Small Indie Developer

  • Carefully crafted and Detailed Lore in a Unique Fantasy setting

  • An Appropriately sized world and Concise JRPG story

  • Evolving NPC Stories

Experience the story through the eyes of newly graduated Guardian Dani Fey, along with her friends and comrades. Oftentimes too brash and sarcastic for her own good, Dani will need to balance the grueling and monotonous duties of being a Guardian while struggling to retain her sense of self.

Characters and Art

  • Anime styled character art

  • Crisp Pixel art sprites with Realistically Rendered environments

  • A Comprehensive and Distinguished soundtrack

title: Time to Strike
description:
Time to Strike mixes Binding of Issac crazy synergies with more streamlined gameplay with a gentle sprinkle of Vampire Survivors. Runs are fast and items are made to synergize with each other!




There are tons of build options to experiment with. Become summon master, create critter army, demolish enemies with massive explosions, fill screen with bullets or anything in between, it is up to you!

Key Features:


  • Fast runs
  • 30+ unique weapons
  • 30+ powerful mods to modify your weapons
  • 80+ fun relics to experiment with
  • Tons of starting options to play around
  • 5 boss fights

title: Super Jump Guys
description:
Overview:
Super Jump Guys is a charming and whimsical platformer game that takes inspiration from the joyful and playful spirit of "Only Up!" In this captivating adventure, players embark on an exciting journey through a whimsical world of vertically stacked levels. These levels are a delightful mishmash of quirky obstacles and gravity-defying jumps. The ultimate goal is to ascend to new heights while skillfully avoiding a myriad of hazards. Get ready for an epic adventure that challenges your skills, creativity, and reflexes in this delightful game.

Key Features:

Vertical Stacking: The game features vertically stacked levels, each with its own unique theme, challenges, and surprises. Ascend through a variety of imaginative environments, from enchanted forests to mechanical factories.

Gravity-Defying Jumps: Enjoy a gravity-defying experience as you leap from one level to another. Master the art of timing your jumps to navigate through intricate platforming sequences.

Quirky Obstacles: Encounter a wide range of whimsical obstacles that will test your agility and problem-solving skills. Dodge spinning saw blades, bounce on giant marshmallows, and swing from vines made of licorice.

Unique Controls: Innovative 3D platformer gameplay reminiscent of Mario 64
Fluid and responsive character controls that offer a unique gaming experience

Character Skins: Personalize your style with over 50+ skins, Show off your unique style as you progress through the game. It's important to note that character skins are items and do not affect gameplay mechanics.

Multiplayer Madness: Challenge your friends in local or online multiplayer mode. Compete to see who can reach the highest level or work together to conquer the game's toughest challenges.

Hidden Secrets: Explore each level thoroughly to uncover hidden secrets, bonus stages, and collectibles that add depth to the gameplay and enhance replayability.

Leaderboards and Achievements: Compete with players worldwide on leaderboards and strive to earn achievements that showcase your platforming prowess.

Super Jump Guys: offers a delightful and exhilarating gaming experience, filled with creativity, humor, and endless challenges. Whether you're playing solo or with friends, you'll find yourself immersed in a world where the only way is up, and the fun never stops. Get ready to leap into a whimsical adventure like no other!

title: Feudal Baron: King's Land: Prologue
description:
Check out more games from our publisher



About the Game


Feudal Baron: King's Land: Prologue is the first chapter of the campaign of the full game Feudal Baron: King's Land, thanks to which you can feel the atmosphere of the game.

In Feudal Baron: King's Land: Prologue, you play the role of a baron who manages the land received after the death of your father. You start with just a handful of people who, attracted by the wealth and charm of the surrounding area, have come from nearby villages.
Develop your settlement. Ensure the best flow of goods and services by determining the impact areas of buildings. Make difficult decisions. Issue decrees that influence the life and development of the entire medieval settlement.

title: Shell's Kitchen
description:
Dive into a fintastic culinary adventure where fish serve fish dishes to fishes, and scale new heights of seafood fun with your friends in this cooperative cooking game! In this 2-player local co-op game, you play as the two sons of the world renowed chef Gordon Clamsay. In order to inherit the family restaurant, you have to prove your worth! Work together to chop, cook, combine, and serve the correct orders to keep your customers satisfied!
Shell's Kitchen was made by students in our own custom engine "Catbox" over the course of 9 weeks.

title: Tank War Shooting Simulator
description:
Tank War Shooting Simulator is a unique game that takes players to an apocalyptic environment and offers a realistic tank simulator experience decorated with 3D graphics. This game will maximize your interest in tank battles.

Game Modes: Variety and Action

In Tank War Shooting Simulator, there are two different and attractive game modes:

Deathmatch Mode: This mode features over ten battle tanks ready for battle. Players can fight against rival tanks by choosing the tank they want from this variety. The goal is to destroy all enemy tanks and be the last tank standing. However, in the meantime, you must develop a careful strategy to protect your tank's health and minimize damage from rival tanks. This mod provides the perfect backdrop for strategy masters and tank battle lovers.

Speed Battle Mode: In this mode, players only have one tank, but this tank is high-speed and robust. This mode offers a fast and intense tank combat experience. You must use your skills and speed to eliminate opposing tanks quickly. Fighting a single tank tests your tactical thinking abilities and increases the need to react quickly.

Realistic Experience: Different Camera Angles

Tank War Shooting Simulator offers more than three different in-game camera angles to give players a realistic experience. This allows players to observe their tank from all angles and better evaluate their surroundings. Different camera angles can be used to detect enemies and gain strategic advantages. Players feel like real tank drivers thanks to this feature.

Tank War Shooting Simulator is an excellent option for those who love tank battles and strategy games. Realistic graphics, various game modes, and different camera angles keep players glued to the screen, making them feel like real tank drivers. This game offers an adrenaline-filled experience for tank games and war games enthusiasts.

title: My Pretty Neighbor Chloe
description:
Upcoming Games:



Join our community!


About the Game

Are you feeling stressed? Don't worry.

Chloe is here to help you!





Relax and brighten up your day with a classic puzzle game!

Features


  • Revealing Clothes
After you completed the puzzle you can click on the puzzle and her clothes will be removed

  • Gallery
The game has a zoom feature. You can double-click or scroll to zoom in on the pictures in the gallery. (I wanted to mention this in case you want to do some scientific research..)

  • Versatile and User friendly
The game mechanics & UI/UX (Menus and buttons) are developed/designed to provide you a simple, clean and user friendly experience.

  • Relaxing Music Player
There's a music player in the game, so you can dance while you play.. or you can just turn it off if you don't like it. Everyone has the right to play the game in silence and peace, right?

Let me know what you think!
Happy gaming ;)

title: Solitude
description:
Solitude is an enthralling survival adventure game that plunges players into the heart of an expansive island following a catastrophic boat wreck amid a relentless storm. Armed with only a backpack and flashlight, players find themselves grappling with the island's perilous landscapes, requiring them to deftly navigate treacherous terrain while managing scarce resources. Unravelling the mysteries woven into the island's fabric becomes a central focus as players progress through the dynamic day-night cycle, where the challenges of the night are balanced by the allure of uncovering hidden secrets in key locations



Key Features

  • Survival Crafting: Prepare during the day and survive during the night against the onslaught of Spirits
  • Sanity: Certain challenges at night will test the players sanity affecting the gameplay
  • Horror: The supernatural threats will evoke fear towards the player truly testing the survivors capability
  • Powers: By destroying altars around the island, the player will attain powers to aid them on their adventure



In Solitude, survival is an intricate dance with resource management, where players must gather essentials crafting materials and supplies to thrive. The game's Crafting System transforms survival into an art, allowing players to craft tools, shelters, and vital items. The scarcity of resources is matched only by the horrors that await the player once the sun sets, supernatural threats emerge from the dark to stalk and hunt the player. You must tap into ancient secrets to defend yourself from the paranormal inhabitants of the island, finding locations of primordial and ritualistic power to create tools with which you may defend yourself. Solitude not only tests players against the island's harsh conditions but also integrates primal needs, making every crafting choice and sustenance intake a pivotal part of the immersive survival experience.



Exploration is a central aspect of the gameplay, inviting players to uncover the island's mysteries through a diverse array of key locations such as landmarks, caves, ancient ruins, and enigmatic structures and ritualistic altars. The narrative unfolds through the discovery of clues and secrets hidden throughout the landscape, including concealed notes, cryptic artefacts, and engaging puzzles. As players navigate the island, the exploration aspect becomes a compelling journey, encouraging them to piece together the island's past and unravel its secrets through immersive discoveries and intriguing revelations.

title: Temple Crawler
description:
A turn-based roguelike dungeon crawler where you maneuver to collect items enabling you to fight enemies. Pick your hero, craft your deck, unlock powerful artifacts and forge your path through dungeons filled with ruthless enemies, dangerous traps and cataclysmic events!

ROGUELIKE GAMEPLAY

Explore procedurally generated dungeons filled with intricate puzzles and challenges, ensuring that each descent is a unique experience. With procedurally generated content and a variety of character builds to experiment with, this game offers endless replay-ability for both new and seasoned adventurers.

EACH DECISION MATTERS

Each move shape your environment where you have to make your path. Each decisions impact all future possibilities, and each move hides a great tactical depth. Engage in strategic battles against a variety of enemies, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Plan your moves carefully to emerge victorious.

UNLOCKABLE ARTIFACTS, HEROES AND DUNGEONS

Unlock heroes with different starting abilities and skills to create your custom run! Discover a wealth of items that can aid or hinder your progress, and craft your gear wisely with more than 50 artifacts offering a wide variety of effects that you can unlock with every game you play! Unlock the various dungeon realms and uncover how each one introduces new rules, increasing the game's difficulty. Will you be able to reach the final dungeon?
genre: Action, Adventure, Strategy, Free To Play

title: Pixel Arcade
description:
Early Development Build

The game is still in development with experimental gameplay and temporary visual effects.

Portal into Pixel Arcade, a VR platformer set in a neon cyberspace playground. Navigate and race through over 10 unique levels at launch, unlocking new chapters in the campaign while aiming to beat your all-time high score. It's not just a game—it's an adrenaline packed, calorie-burning adventure that pushes the boundaries of VR locomotion mechanics. Master levels to achieve global dominance in the leaderboard.

  • Adrenaline-Packed Gameplay: Experience the most exciting and gravity-defying locomotion mechanics in VR.

  • Linear Level Progression: Progress through over 10 meticulously designed levels, each offering unique challenges.

  • Replayability: Master every level to perfection and climb the global leaderboard.

  • All Ages: Designed to be enjoyed by players of all ages.

  • Checkpoints and Strategies: Activate checkpoints in any order, allowing for diverse strategies to complete each level.

  • Future Multiplayer Support: Look forward to co-op and 6 player race mode in future updates!

  • Seasonal Updates: The game supports cheat codes, find the terminal and keep an eye out for codes on social media!

  • Exclusive In-Game Content: Unlock special content by replaying levels and achieving mastery.

  • Challenge yourself, compete globally, and immerse yourself in the stimulating and dynamic world of Pixel Arcade. Defy gravity, perfect your strategy, and become a VR champion.

title: Eclipse 2: Invasion of Darkness
description:
Eclipse 2: Invasion of Darkness – is an isometric, story-driven game in the Action RPG genre, combining the mechanics of metroidvania exploration and the dynamics of modern slashers.

The game's plot tells the story of a medieval man who finds himself at the center of an extraterrestrial invasion. The main hero, his family, and local residents are abducted by aliens. Thanks to incredible luck, combat skills, and the intervention of a mysterious voice, our main hero manages to escape from the spaceship back to Earth, taking some alien technologies with him. Later, upon learning that his family is on another ship and a full-scale invasion is unfolding on Earth, the hero begins to act.

- The combat system: The core elements of gameplay are the player's active skills and the effective use of their acquired unique abilities, rather than just the stats of items, weapons, or armor. Find a unique approach to exterminate each type of enemy or utilize the features of locations and surrounding objects to defeat the enemy!

- The semi open world provides the player with an extensive area for exploration and interaction. All locations are interconnected and become available as the story progresses or new skills are acquired.

- The game world is a completely fictional universe, not based on any historical facts. The local residents have their own culture, art, and way of life. The Middle Ages is a conditional designation of the current stage of human development in the world of Eclipse. Sometimes, the player may encounter technologies and items not typical of the Middle Ages, but later, the plot will provide an explanation for their appearance.

Lead the medieval resistance against the alien invasion on Earth!

title: Runemancer
description:
In Runemancer you play the vital role of a healer, the cornerstone of any adventurer group. Your mission is to support your allies by skillfully combining runes to amplify their abilities.

Features:


Empower Your Allies: As the healer, your expertise lies in combining runes to enhance your comrades' capabilities. Turn the tide of battle by strategically boosting their strength and ensuring their survival.



Choose Your Path: You have the opportunity to select new abilities as you progress through the game. Your choices are crucial, shaping your character's development and determining your party's destiny. Pick your abilities wisely based on the unique build you envision for your team.

Wave-Based Challenges: Runemancer offers an exciting wave-based gameplay experience, with each stage presenting distinct challenges. Face off against hordes of formidable enemies and adapt your strategies as you progress through the game's dynamic stages.



Prepare to embark on an epic adventure as the healer in Runemancer. Your decisions will be the key to success as you empower your allies and guide them to victory in this thrilling wave-based RPG.

title: Midnight Furry
description:
In the heart of the Victorian era, hides a mansion where mysticism and reality intertwine into one. "Mindnigt furry" is a furry erotica game where each character carries animal sexuality, mystery and an otherworldly demonic element. In this mansion, where hot scenes combine with dark menace, players will come face to face with vampires, frills and demonesses with not only deadly power but also seductive charisma.

You are in the role of a guest who is allowed to open sex scenes with the inhabitants of the mansion, after passing simple quests.

To get through the level quickly, you can enter the code word “SEX”

In our game you will find images of sex, anal sex, group sex, oral sex, masturbation, elements of dolling, BDSM in the form of bondage, binding, suspension, hints of forced sex, deep throat, cumming. Sexy witches on broomsticks. Sex on pumpkins. Botanical tentacles. Just hot anthropomorphic kitties, dogs, bunnies, mice in gothic-sexual style.

Features:

  • 4 game modes

  • Dynamic gameplay and difficulty levels

  • Multiple difficulty levels with hot illustrations at the end of each level

  • Mysterious atmosphere and music

Game Modes

  • Puzzle

  • Crossroad

  • Throw the ball

  • 2048


♥ All artwork by LavenderKitty69 ♥

title: Pholee
description:
To get to the past - you have to take a photo in the present

Pholee is a colourful game about a Time camera keeper who travels through photos in search of her. Go to the past - visit many incredible locations and meet completely different people who will share with you memories of their lives and the missing artefact. Solve puzzles by changing the time of day, search for pieces of a common puzzle, meet a helper who will be a faithful friend on your journey and fill an album with photos. Reunite with the lost Time Camera to make a choice that will change the fate of the guardian.

Features:

  • Incredibly beautiful hand-drawn levels

  • 15 different locations that get more colourful with each level.

  • Day and night for all levels, changing the puzzles and making them even more challenging.

  • A photo album to keep a memory of every place you visit

  • Characters that will dispel loneliness with their stories.

  • A companion who will stay with you until the very end!

title: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? - Space Conquest DLC Pack
description:
This DLC contains an extra pack of ~140 questions on the topic: Space conquest
Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme!

title: YUME 4
description:
Coming soon!



Previous work




About the Game

Game background

As the fourth part of the YUME series, this is still a story centered on Chen Xi, but the perspective is unfolded by you, a hot emerging director.
As the most outstanding young director today, you are handsome and rich, and you are often approached by unknown starlets or girls who aspire to be in the entertainment industry...
So what, you still named Chen Xi as the heroine of the new movie, please! Chen Xi is your favorite female star since you entered the entertainment industry. She is really awesome.
When I entered the set, I unexpectedly discovered that she has been losing energy recently and kept mumbling about "Menghan".
How can outsiders understand her distress...

Gameplay

Chen Xi and the memory of her previous life once again split into two forms, one on each side of the maze. How can she obtain the memory of her previous life? ?
YUME 4 is a maze-breaking game, in which Chen Xi moves in the opposite direction to her previous life. Players need to use keyboard control to reach the designated position to enter the next level!
There will be many dangers to stop your progress, be careful not to get Chen Xi injured!
The gameplay of the YUME series has been updated again. You can interact with characters in free mode to get different reactions and favorability~

title: Crypt's Rend
description:
💕ONANIましょう👉👌


About the Game

A big war broke out between the human army and the demon army led by the Demon King.

Celia, an ordinary woman whose hometown was affected by the war.

She was evacuated to a small town named Valiente.

A year later, Celia fell in love with a young man named Hayato whom she met in Valiente.

However, just as she was about to declare her love to Hayato, both fell into the trap set by succubus.

Celia and Hayato were told,

"find the code hiddden in the room so that you may leave."

Naturally, the cunning succubus designed an escape game full of deliberate defects.

The information scattered in the room is more like praising Sade, the succubus leader, than providing clues about the code.

Moreover, as them entered new stage, the succubus's evil and insidious temptations would assault them.

Celia

A brave and kind-hearted girl who is not good at expressing herself.

Influenced by the war, she was forced to evacuate to a town called "Valiente".

In there, she met Hayato who treated her well, so she found herself in the pain of lovesickness.

She is unaware herself, but she seems to be " descendant of the Goddess."

Although she was targeted or even attacked, she was not discouraged.

It's all about having a bright future with Hayato.

Meryl

One of Sadie's harem members, she is a charming and Lewd succubus.

She is good at seduction and espionage.

During the war, she was a dangerous demon who confounded many male soldiers and politicians,

influencing the conflict.

She is especially fond of teasing boys younger than her.

  • There are a total of six chapters.

Each section presents different stories and tempting plots based on various choices.

  • What's on their minds

Through various explorations, the thoughts of Celia and Hayato will be changed,

and the impressions of Meryl can be seen on the menu.

  • Dialog

During various investigations, the actions and dialogues will be recorded in the window at the bottom left corner.

  • Negative impact of sex

If tempted (have forced events), it will be added to the H record.

  • Character Dictionary

You can view all kinds of information in the Character Dictionary.

title: MAOUISHO:~ La Dolce Vita with Another World's Demon Lord~
description:
💕ONANIましょう👉👌


About the Game

◆Story

One day, you meet a woman with scars all over her body.

Although she was unable to communicate verbally and exuded a suspicious atmosphere,

but because of the company, you were physically and mentally exhausted and out of control,

you chose to accept her directly.

Just like that, your life with this woman begins.

A few days later——

Miraculously, within a few days she gained enough skills to communicate.

She then reveals,

"I come from a different world —I am the "Demon Lord".

◆Gameplay

This is a sim game where you have "sweet interactions" with the Demon Lord from another world... ♪

The heroine, "Ronie" is the Demon Lord of another world. With her charm and tolerance, she will affirm and accommodate all your worries♪

Let’s taste different healing methods together♪

You can enjoy being hugged by the Demon Lord, listen to her cleaning your ears on your knees, spend time together holding hands, lie on the bed and talk about the day's events, go to work together, and might even completely reform a harsh corporate environment!

With the unique perspective of the Demon Lord from another world, she will tolerate you gently♪

◆Character

Ronie(CV:天知遥):

Her real name is "Vashuronia," Commonly known as "Ronie."

A Demon Lord who reincarnation from another world.

Because she once led monsters, she has excellent charisma and high adaptability.

Master completely unfamiliar language in less than a week.

Also, she is incredibly tolerant and maternal.

Due to her ability to absorb magic from semen, she is very sex-positive...

Gradually, she even likes the process of making you feel pleasure.

What was the reason for her to transfer from another world...?

◆Game Features

◇Rich script with 300,000 words, an endless and captivating storyline

◇You can decide the process of H events, equipped with specific event commands

◇Depending on different intimate events, there may be various cosplay outfits to choose from

The dialogue style will also changes♪

◇Endless game, enabling you to spend happy days with the Demon Lord regardless of your choices♪

title: Filly Astray
description:
A platforming adventure game with a new take on combos, dare you adventure into the world of Filly Astray and face the monsters and mayhem within?!



Chain attacks for increasing damage, but tread carefully – a single miss and you'll be sent tumbling. Inspired by the weight and feel of fighting games, Filly astray aims to bring some of that satisfaction to single player action.



Travel through 6ish different enviroments fighting your way through a varied cast of enemies. Filly Astray contrains 2-5 hours of content for a first play through, as well as challenges to make it interesting for multiple playthroughs.



Test your mettle against 5 bosses.



Be a cute filly.

title: Above the Hill
description:
A horror game about a hiker who found himself in an unknown area with no map after falling down a mountain.
The player in this game must follow the path that should lead him to an abandoned house above the hill and there the main story will take place.
It is a first person horror game about a story of a family that lived in a house far away from society, and what happened to that family will be revealed in the game.
The player can interact with objects, read letters and run away from enemies.
The game contains jumpscares and loud noises as well.

title: Bullet Town Demo
description:
In the distant days of the Wild West, cow-boys were quick to jump the gun. Yet those who survived were not the fastest ones, but the ones who took the time to aim carefully. Will you manage to keep your cool and shoot your way to the final boss through wave after wave of bandits?
Get stronger and stronger as your enemies get bigger, badder and funnier in this roguelike with a generous amount of powerups.

Demo content

This generous demo offers you between 30 minutes and 1 hour of play. You will be able to play the first character, gain temporary powers in the Rogue-lite style, access special bullets, and above all improve your character permanently. The demo will end when you gain access to the other characters.

title: Kizuyami | 刻闇
description:
Kizuyami is a first-person atmospheric psychological horror game that is set in Japan in the 1990s. Will you be able to uncover the mysteries and find your way out?

Controls

WASD - Movement/Swap Item (While Inventory is active)
Left Shift (Hold) - Inventory
Left-Click - Interact/Use Equipped Item
ESC - Pause Menu

Enter The Unknown

You find yourself in a never-ending Japanese street where no matter which direction you go, you cannot leave. You stumble upon the same house over and over again, which calls for you in inexplicable ways. Answer the call.

Investigate Strange Houses

Every house has it's dark, shrouded story embbeded inside. Even though it seems usual at first glance, you can feel something is off. Uncover the mystery. Try to make sense of the unknown. Survive.

Features & Extras

  • 3 houses to explore and investigate the story behind.

  • Interact with various objects, make a path through everything that is in your way to get out.

  • Survive the unknown.

title: Forest Jump
description:
Forest jump is a 3D adventure game in which you escape forest with running and jumping.

Go Up High Along the Obstacle.

If you fall on the way up, you have to do it all over again.

Be Patient.

You will feel more proud when you arrive at your destination.

Features


  • the background and sound of the forest

  • a few deer

  • background sound of a sad situation

  • simple but tricky obstacles

  • Double jump
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports

title: Timagi
description:
"Ah, my young apprentice, it seems the fate of the kingdom rests upon your shoulders now. Here I sit, an old and weary wizard, yearning for nothing more than a quiet puff on my pipe and a nap in the sunshine. But alas, duty calls.

You must learn the ways of magic swiftly, for the realm is plagued by creepy foes and wicked villains. I grow tired of always being the one to save the day. So, listen closely, for I shall teach you a powerful secret – the art of slowing down time.

First, conjure your magic with utmost focus. Imagine time as a river, rushing with haste. Now, envision it slowing, the world around you grinding to a crawl. It's not as easy as it sounds, my boy, but with practice, you shall master it.

When the enemies approach, channel your newfound skill. Freeze them in their tracks, my apprentice, as if time itself bows to your command. Then, with a flick of your wrist and a blast of magic, dispatch those eerie foes back from whence they came.

Remember, young one, while I yearn for peace and solitude, the world needs heroes like you to defend it. So, embrace your destiny, and may your magic and mastery over time shine brighter than any evil that dares to challenge you. And when it's all over, perhaps I can finally enjoy that pipe in peace."

Features


  • Slow Motion: Unleash your inner magician as you manipulate time itself with a click of a button.
  • Compelling Story: Dive into a captivating narrative that will keep you spellbound.
  • Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in an atmospheric universe, rich in detail and ambiance.
  • Handcrafted and Procedurally Generated Levels: Every adventure is unique, blending artisanal craftsmanship with unpredictable surprises.
  • Soundtrack by "Cymbalism": Let the enchanting music guide your every step.
  • Diverse Creatures: Encounter a multitude of fantastical foes, each with its own challenge.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Face off against formidable bosses that will test your skills and bravery.

Developers Note


I'm Thomas, the solo developer of timagi, and most days you'll catch me in my (wizard) bathrobe, stirring up code and gameplay as if I were crafting a magical potion. My room serves as my enchanted laboratory, where the wonders of game development take shape.

Speaking of magic, timagi revolves around the enchanting world of magic and slow motion. It's still simmering in the cauldron of development, but the grand reveal is on the horizon!

Thanks for being part of my magical adventure!

title: CONTORTED Demo
description:
This is the demo of upcoming horror game CONTORTED
(You can find the demo on itch.io! For some reason the download demo button doesn't work and im trying to fix it ASAP....)



With your camera you can use to create light sources in the world and to defend yourself from creatures



New and fresh environments everytime you decend down a well

FEATURES
- 100% Original soundtrack to create a specific kind of eerie and creepy atmosphere
- Beautiful graphics powered by Unreal Engine
- 1 Hour of playtime with no time wasted
- Gameplay that increases tension and fear

title: OVRDARK: a Do Not Open story Demo
Temple Knight Saga -Oath of the Knight's Sword-
description:
1.Production tools
RPG Maker MV

2.Play time
1-2 hours

3.Game introduction text
The story of the Three Temple Knights, dispatched on a secret mission, and takes place in late 19th century Europe.
Along the way, Sir Virginio accepted a request from a certain lady. But what truly awaits him...


4.List the features of this game

A short JRPG about vampires. 3 modes of difficulty!
Easy mode / Normal mode / Hard mode
It can be completed in 1-2 hours.

Great story, told from the perspective of Sir Virgino
Impressive characters, with familiar faces from the Vampire Blaze series.
Unique skills and tactics for key characters
Translated with help from native English speaker, and not machine translation


The story is set in a serious tone, and is related to the Temple Knight and their mission to hunt vampires.

On my official website, I am planning information that you can enjoy for free. For example, character illustrations. Please visit.

title: Unsolved Case: Above the Law Collector's Edition
description:
Dive into the murky depths of criminal intrigue! A powerful villain has no fear of the law. After the high-profile murder of the mayor, it becomes clear that anyone could be a target. Do not let him escape justice! Going undercover, you must bluff your way into a private billiard club to find damning and crucial evidence. All's fair in love and investigation! Your new partner’s too young and immature to understand how dangerous the game you’re involved in is. And not only him, but you also must understand that sometimes even justice goes over to the dark side. Can you defeat the bad guys together with your scattered allies, or at least... stay alive? Play now and find out! Challenge your investigator skills in this spectacular new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

♟️ Your own choices!
After a high-profile murder shakes the city, it's up to you to penetrate the underworld's defenses and prevent a criminal mastermind from escaping justice. Experience a gripping narrative where your decisions shape the fate of your investigation.

♟️ Achievements and Collectibles!
Keep your eyes peeled for hidden collectibles and unlock all achievements to prove your prowess as a top detective. Sharpen your observational skills to find crucial evidence in meticulously designed scenes that challenge even seasoned detectives!

♟️ Complex Puzzles!
Test your intellect with intricate puzzles that require more than just a keen eye. Have your mind be as sharp as a steel trap to piece together the evidence!

♟️ Teamwork and Strategy!
Work alongside your inexperienced partner and guide him through the treacherous paths of criminal investigations. Can you rely on your scattered allies when you need them most?

title: HINGE
description:
HINGE: Dive into a psychological horror filled with deep mythology and a sinister atmosphere. Explore an abandoned Art Deco skyscraper, recreated with stunning graphical realism. Your mission? Search for clues, solve complex puzzles, and evade lurking dangers to escape alive from the temporal loop.

You wake up in a mysterious, recently opened skyscraper. Your memories are blurred images, and time seems distorted. To unravel this mystery, you will need to gather scattered information and fragments of memories.

Features:

  • Captivating Art Deco Design: Immerse yourself in the meticulously recreated atmosphere of the 1920s.
  • Unpredictable Threats: Monsters can emerge without warning, keeping you constantly on edge.
  • Engaging Narrative: Dive deep into a story with multiple unexpected twists and various endings.

title: Cursed Silence
description:
Descend into madness in "Cursed Silence", where the line between reality and dreams blurs, unraveling your sanity as you search for the elusive Emily.

Emily's Mysterious Vanishing: In the dead of night, haunted by haunting dreams, you're inexorably drawn towards the chilling enigma of Emily's disappearance. Explore a world where her presence lingers, and nightmares intertwine with reality.

A Descent into Madness: Immerse yourself in a heart-pounding first-person psychological horror. Traverse a sinister labyrinth where reason dissolves, and terror thrives.

title: Citadelum
description:
Defy the Gods of the Pantheon or follow their will. Become the master of oh so many lives and destiny of so few in this twist to the genre face to face with the old deities.

Build your settlement. Gather and refine resources from forests and quarries, breed animals, grow vegetables, fish and make wine, so you can keep your population healthy and fed. Improve your buildings and ensure water supply with aqueducts. Welcome citizens to your village as artisans, farmers, carpenters... or train them to join your legions in different units. Towers and walls will protect your village from barbarian attacks, while it grows into a magnificent city.

Expand. Explore the world map, free villages under siege and experience the power of the most advanced armies of the era: the legion, engaging in tactical auto-battle combat. Once the territory is secured, you can set trade routes, import exotic resources and scale up your economy. Send out your explorers to find a collection of mythological objects that will help you in your expansion and complete missions for the Senate.

Honour. Rise to the pantheon and gain the favor of the gods. Build temples, make offerings so they will grant you gifts. But beware, because gods behave in a capricious and ruthless manner; worship one of them and you may suffer the wrath of another. Interaction with deities allows a non linear, replayable narrative, full of mythical encounters. Prepare to be amazed when they come down to earth and help you, or tremble with fear if they punish your people.

City Building, evolved. Citadelum presents a unique three layered gameplay, based in city building core mechanics, strategic expansion and commerce, and the role of the gods. You will find different missions, artifacts and challenges in every playthrough.

title: Halloween Games for Toddlers and Kids
description:
MORE GAMES FOR KIDS:


About the Game

The perfect educational game for fearless children!

We recommend leaving the diaper on during play to be on the safe side. ;)



Please note that our game includes a reward system where children can collect stars by solving puzzles. When you collect 200 stars, another game is unlocked in which the children compete against a virtual cat (A.I.) in a memory (find the pairs) card game.


Our puzzle game for children aged 1 to 6 was developed by educators and lovingly designed by our in-house graphic designers and features fun music and funny animations. There is a lot to discover.

If you want to surprise your child for Halloween, then get our fun children's learning game now.
Long-term fun guaranteed!

Your McPeppergames team

title: Fish Survivor - Feed, Grow and Evolve!
description:
Fish Survivor is a survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements.

Dive into an epic underwater world, where you'll start as a small fish and embark on an exciting survival journey.
Hunt, feed and grow into super-sized sea creatures as you explore an amazing underwater playground, all while evolving and gaining new abilities along the way.

Watch as your fishy friend transforms and evolves into more powerful forms with unique abilities.

Join Fish Survivor and swim, munch, evolve, and gain new abilities on your way to becoming the coolest fish in the sea.
It's time for an underwater adventure like no other!

title: Climbing Back to the Mothership Demo
description:
Game Introduction:

Climbing Back to the Mothership might look like a typical 2D platformer.
But using "seems" to describe the genre feels a bit inaccurate. After thorough research, we found that the surveyor in the game can't actually jump because he's unconscious. He can't jump, and he can't move on his own. The core mechanic of the game revolves around using the grappling hook on the surveyor's arm to move around.
From feet to hands, from jumping to grappling, from nothing to something.
So, Climbing Back to the Mothership is a 2D platform drag-and-pull game.
For more details, please visit the full version's store page.

title: Liberators' Chronicles
description:
Embark on an adventure about the South American independence struggles in this captivating turn-based strategy game, in which you will command brave leaders and soldiers who seek the liberation of South America from the oppressive Spanish yoke in the context of the Napoleonic wars.

Face different challenges such as defending cities, intercepting convoys, capturing ships, escorting vital units, defeating key enemies and even taking fortresses.

Prove your tactical prowess in an exciting journey towards historic independence in South America!

title: Before The Coming End: Power Play Gets Dominated (eBooks)
description:
Power Play is the strongest superhero in the world. He’s a dominating force wherever he goes.

But all his power gets in the way of what he wants most: being dominated by someone else. Who can be strong enough to force him to submit?

A new weapon that weakens Power Play might be what he needs. However, Power Play keeps seeking out that feeling, putting him at the mercy of men who are all to willing to take advantage of a weakened superhero.

Includes all eight stories (40k+ words total), plus high-res covers, each with an NSFW version.
Comes in ePub, mobi, and PDF formats (does not include an eReader).

***

HOW TO ACCESS DLC FILES
DLC files found with in the game installation path
Once downloaded, you'll find this in the DLC of Fresh Force Frustrations in your Steam Library. Right-click the name of the game, click on Properties, then go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the DLC there.

Example file path: C:\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\TheComingEndFreshForce

***


Power Play #1: Alley Way Reward
Power Play is the strongest superhero in the world. He’s a dominating force wherever he goes. After stopping a robbery, Power Play receives an unexpected thank you. But the encounter raises new feelings about how much he dominates, and if he would prefer a different role.


Power Play #2: Rooftop Rumble
Power Play’s greatest fantasy is being dominated, but as the world’s most powerful superhero, no one can really control him.
That is until Power Play encounters a strange weapon that deprives him of his abilities. He becomes weak, vulnerable, and completely aroused. Thankfully, there’s a group of criminals ready to help out.



Power Play #3: Roles Reversed
Power Play lost his superpowers and had the best sexual experience of his life.
But his powers came back, and now he can’t replicate the thrill of being truly dominated.
Power Play wants to find out how he lost his powers, and maybe experience the incredible weakness again. He goes into the seedy underworld of Edge City hoping to find what he’s been missing.


Power Play #4: Final Submission
Power Play has found the creator of the power draining weapon, and can feel weak and dominated anytime he wants. But it means making a deal he might regret.
Will Power Play fight his urges or submit to his greatest enemy?


Power Play #5: Medical Exam
All Power Play can think of is his experience being dominated. His powers and his suit were stripped away, and there was nothing he could do but accept all the painful pleasure he had to endure. But with his powers back, he’s too strong for anyone to dominate. He tries, yet fails to find the same thrill as before.
Power Play considers Dr. Remedy might have some way to weaken or restrain him. Will that be enough to satisfy his craving for domination?


Power Play #6: Drained Dry
A new villain has completely drained a superhero of his powers. Curious if this is connected to the way Power Play lost his powers before, he investigates. This leads him to an enemy from his past that has new abilities, including sapping superheroes of their powers. Power Play tries to get away, but he gets overpowered. He’s no match for the Sadist!


Power Play #7: Obedient Captive
Power Play has been drained of his powers and kept chained in a cage for days. The villain Sadist appears every few hours to play with his captive toy. This is the domination Power Play wanted, yet there seems to be no end to his captivity. Sadist appears, though this time he's followed by multiple men, each ready to see what it's like to dominate a superhero!


Power Play #8: Doomed Domination
Power Play gets dragged upstairs by a leash. He's still bound in chains, but free from his cage. However, this walk isn't leading him to his freedom. His captor, Sadist, brings Power Play before his greatest enemy. But Sadist isn't planning to hand the superhero over. Without any superpowers, Power Play has to survive multiple double crosses between two villains, and decide if he wants to remain a dominated sex slave anymore.

title: The Coming End: Fresh Force Frustrations - Unlock All Images
description:
Fresh Force Frustration includes more than 500 CG images and 300+ sprites. You'll unlock many as you play, though you may also want to enjoy them outside of the game. With this download, you get image files of all the CG and sprites from the game. Note: This will not affect the game itself - you can still unlock gallery images as you play.
