title: What's on Agenda
description:
Discord Community


About the Game

A short, chill social clicker where you shape the narrative of the newly formed SARO Federation. Follow Jan Eteri, a prominent lawyer, and see how propaganda changes society's perception.

Balance the satisfaction of citizens and elites by deciding how to present historical facts. Stay in power for as long as you can.

Creators' comment: "ironic and just the right amount of discomfort — exactly as we planned."

Powered by ILHI

title: Astro Link Demo
description:
Astro Link is a Portal-like puzzle game that takes place withing the mysterious Astro Link facility. What is happening to this place? Will test subject #602 be able to find out?

Use your ability to switch places with your very own teleportation portal to solve mind-bending puzzles!


And discover what happened to the facility.

title: Treasure Dive
description:
Treasure Dive is a game about collecting loot to upgrade your character. Dive down and dodge fish while collecting trash, scrap, gems, and even a whole treasure chest which is worth so much money that you can actually cause an integer overflow (I'll fix it eventually).

PLAY THE ALPHA RIGHT NOW ON ITCH.IO!

title: MOTIONREC
description:
MotionRec is a record puzzle action game that uses the power to record and replay motion trails to explore a devastated world.

Use MotionRec to unravel the mysteries of a world ruled by machines!

Recording

The trajectory of walking and jumping can be recorded.

Complex movements can also be recorded using gimmicks on the stage.

Playback

Recorded movements can be played back on the spot.

There is a limit to the number of times it can be replayed in the air, and it recovers when it lands on the ground.

PressKit

Credit

HANDSUM inc.

Pixel Art：m7kenji

Music：KyoheiFujita

Developer：shoma

title: TH3-M15 GUILD
description:
Deploy into battle as the TH3-M15 Guild, the deadliest group of mercenaries across the land! Hauntingly, there exists no reported sightings on any of the active members, making the people wonder if the guild even exists. Those that do know them, are either in awe or in fear of the guild’s prowess and efficiency. With the world now at war, between the Aigam Council and Phian Federation, TH3-M15 guild has once again been hired and is on the move. They’ll do whatever it takes to complete their mission…

In this rogue-lite, bullet hell game, players will undertake dangerous assignments, fighting off armies of robots and creatures alike. Use an arsenal of unique skills, weapons, and items to mow down your enemies!

Do you have what it takes to finish the job, mercenary?

KEY FEATURES

  • Go into battle in uniquely created maps, against hordes of enemies and bosses. Each map will have its own hazards and mechanics to give players a great challenge.

  • Fight an array of bosses, all with their own special designs and attacks.

  • Earn and loot a diverse set of weapons, armors, and items to strengthen your mercenary.

  • Overdrive your skills and weapons, evolving the carnage to the next level.

  • Mix and match your favorite mercenaries with your best weapons together for endless possibilities!

title: Rockets, Planes, Soldiers
description:
A relaxing board game based on the rock-paper-scissor logic, with turn-based strategy on a hex-grid. Very simple to start playing but can get really complex and deep.

The maps are procedurally generated and you will never play the same map twice.

The basic logic always stays the same: Rocket beats Soldiers, Soldiers beats Plane and Plane beats Rockets, but you must decide on quick deploy units and attack or wait and accumulate resources before a strong push. There is also lots of upgrades that create another level of complexity as you progress into the campaign.

title: Puma: the Cat
description:
Embark on an exciting pixelated adventure with "Puma: The Cat," a 2D platform game brimming with emotion and friendship. Take control of Puma, a lovely cat who lived happily in an animal shelter alongside her inseparable friend Mia. However, life plays a trick, and Mia is adopted by a family, leaving Puma alone.

Puma's journey to reunite with Mia is filled with challenges and dangers. In this game, you will explore a variety of maps, each with its secrets and unique challenges, while facing countless enemies and obstacles.

Key Features:

Pixel Art Style: Enjoy the nostalgic aesthetics of pixel art, full of charm and detail.


Platforming Mechanics: Overcome clever obstacles and execute precise jumps in immersive platform gameplay.


Diverse Maps: Explore a variety of maps, each with its own environment and unique challenges.


Challenging Encounters: Confront a series of enemies on your journey, testing your skills and strategies.

title: Firebowl
description:
Before balls, there were spells! Challenge your friends individually or by teams in the most crazy and funny sport that has ever existed! Invented in a tavern by a drunken group of adventurers, FireBowl is easy to play and even easier to master (did we already mention that they were all drunk?): hit the fireball, hit other players, kick them when they are on the ground or simply dance... But whatever you do, don't let your sphere get destroyed! It contains a spell that will keep you captive until the wizard acting as referee sobers up.

You can play alone, but we strongly suggest playing multiplayer modes (as long as you don't mind losing your friends).

FireBowl will include:

Arcade Mode - 1 Player
Arena Mode - 4 Players VS
Singles Match - 2 Players, 1 VS 1
Doubles Match - 4 Players, 2 VS 2
Dragon's Defy - 1 - 4 Players, Cooperative

title: Retro Mystery Club Vol.2: The Beppu Case
description:
Play the latest installment in this retro mystery series that travels across Japan!
This time, the stage is set in Beppu, Oita Prefecture!
There, hearts that pass each other by can’t help but grow twisted…
Uncover the truth behind a mysterious death with your junior detective, Ken!

Encounter a cast of intriguing characters in this suspense-filled drama and discover the truth behind the case. Meet Soichiro Anan, the head of a famous family of bamboo craftspeople in Beppu, and his wife, Midori, along with their ever-loyal housekeeper, Mitsu, and the seductive Tokiko…
The manga artist Kiyokazu Arai continues his work on the series and designed all the characters.



Prologue:
Beppu, Oita Prefecture... In this scenic locale, an unprecedented artistic event, Technomix, is being held, with the hope of fusing Beppu's traditional bamboo crafts with the latest digital art.

Soichiro Anan, the head of a prominent family of bamboo craftspeople, is working with Artenova, a cutting-edge digital art group. Word of their collaboration quickly spreads and sparks anticipation. However, as the event approaches, all the attention makes them the object of envy and resentment. Their critics grow in number and volume, and harassment soon devolves into death threats.

At the same time, in recognition of your unique investigative achievements, you and your junior detective, Ken, are hurriedly dispatched to Oita and tasked with strengthening security at the event. Empathizing with the event’s organizers, you decide to devote yourselves to Technomix’s success, and to protecting everyone involved.

However, fate has other plans, and events take a sudden, dark turn ...

title: 铲屎官兼侦探-Cat Detective
description:
Do you know about psychic powers? Fiona, an "ordinary" girl who has spent more than ten years hiding her identity as a psychic, is involved in a building crash while jerking off a cat in a cafe one day.

The owner of the cafe is a detective with supernatural powers. By chance, fiona follows detective Jack and joins the Serious Crimes Unit 2 where police officer Charlie is working, and while solving cases of pua, domestic violence, and violence in schools ......, fiona gradually discovers the truth that lurks beneath the calm surface of the city of E! ......

People's discrimination and prejudice against people with special abilities, so that the body with special abilities fiona hidden for more than ten years, each of us will be prejudice, malice and discrimination plagued, but we still have to heart to the light, adhere to justice, and fight against all the darkness and evil!

Game Features
Shovel Knight and Detective" works with multiple unit dramas + a main line of cases strung together, easy to read without difficulty, the plot is concise and smooth without dragging, each case will be quoted in the current popular elements, inspire readers to resonate and cause deep thought.
3. Gameplay
Shoveler and Detective" is a plot-oriented work that consists of a main case linking multiple unit plays, which contains:
The first case: bad pua
The second case: domestic violence
The third case: deformed rice circle + sexual assault
The fourth case: campus violence + depression
Fifth case: sexism + sexual assault
Sixth case: excessive controlling desire
......
The gameplay is varied and players need to collect various clues to gradually understand the truth behind each case ......

The ending aspect of the game combines elements of social reality. People's discrimination and prejudice against people with different abilities in the work is not the same as sexism, racism, geographical discrimination and other kinds of discrimination in real life. Born as human beings, we all have an evil side, we all have had malicious intent for no reason, we all fall into prejudice or are affected by prejudice to a greater or lesser extent, these are unavoidable, and what we have to do is to overcome TAs, overcome TAs, and don't get lost in TAs.
In addition, Echo's ending design is also very bright, no matter whether it is in his main line or not, he has to take his due responsibility for his illegal and criminal behaviour, which is what the law should be like - punishing the evil and upholding fairness and justice. Even if too many evil people get away with it in reality, we all have to stick to the bottom line of justice and punish all lawbreakers and criminals severely!

title: Concealed Demo
description:
About


The "Parallel" comic series:

“Parallel” is a series of short horror comics created by "九日十夜", which brings together many long or short independent horror stories. Comparing with "Ghost in the Pool", the first attempt of game making in this series, "Concealed" is a much bigger work in terms of scale and gameplay.

Story


It all started from a peaceful semester when Meng Jiangnan returned to "帝英灵" high school after finishing her exchange program abroad.

Like all other regular students, Meng had been living a simple life in the school, until the occurrence of some weird incidents one after another...

With missing girls, unsolved cases, and bizarre urban tales circulating in the school for years, the truth is to be illuminated. Is it cruel or heartrending? Meng had to face what were about to happen all by herself…

title: Lucky Hero Demo
description:
"Lucky Hero": A Fantasy Adventure Weaving Wisdom, Exploration, and Strategy! Welcome to the world of "Lucky Hero"! This is a game that perfectly combines roguelike adventures with strategy. Together we'll engage in battles with a variety of enemies using the wheel of fortune, unlock and combine various symbols and character skills!
In this unique game, traditional weapons and equipment have evolved into symbols within the Wheel of Fortune. Tactfully combine these symbols to battle powerful enemies from different regions.
The game offers a rich symbol library and unique character skills, along with three different professions providing endless strategic possibilities for your battles. In this process, a well-thought-out strategy and a bit of luck are essential.
In this challenging world full of strategies, only by thoroughly studying various enemies and symbol combinations can you become the true Lucky Hero!

title: Dark Swords Firelink
description:
Embark on an epic journey to save your village and the world of Iggrand.

In the land of Iggrand, humans have ruled since their arrival on Cretea. But after encountering the primordial fire, wars ravaged the continent and brought mankind to the brink of extinction.

From this time, we speak of the dark swords, the most powerful weapons of the Lordhem kingdom. With these swords, Lordhem nearly conquered the entire continent. But the united kingdoms rebelled, and Lordhem lost its power.

Firelink is the heiress of a dark sword left by her grandfather Fianor. She had never wielded the sword until her village, Osthem, was attacked by a host of creatures commanded by a huge demon.

Seeking revenge and to protect Osthem from any future threats, Firelink wields the dark sword and embarks on an epic journey. Along the way, she begins to understand the sword's power and its influence on her, acquires new abilities, and faces huge monsters. She also plays an important role in the fate of Iggrand and the events that are about to unfold.

title: Impossible Game
description: "Impossible Game" is exactly what it sounds like: impossible. It's just a spinning cube on your screen. Press keys, unlock achievements. But beware, it gets harder and harder until it's downright impossible. Think you can beat it?

title: Crashimals
description: Welcome to Crashimals, where feathers fly and ponds run red with the blood of your opponents. In this intense battle royale game, you'll take on the role of a fearless duck competing against others in a fight for survival. Strap on your webbed feet, sharpen your beak, and get ready to quack your way to victory!

title: 별을 좇는 까마귀(To The Star)
description:
Story:
The cat and crow living in the witch's hut, and the crow, who only looked at the stars every night in the cage, decided to escape from the hut...
Be a crow and break the code in the witch's hut and escape!

How to play the game:
This game is a cryptographic escape room game!
You can escape by clicking on the mouse to collect hints from all over the house and using code and workarounds to unlock the four different passwords and keyboard the correct magic spell on the magic order.
If you write down the wrong password, the cat will be warned, which is allowed up to 3 times!

title: Spellbound Survivors
description:
Immerse yourself deeply in a pixelated realm where each map unfolds before your eyes as pages of an epic tale, facing off against the formidable Overlord Wizard, who commands vast hordes of soul reapers.




With every map you conquer, unlock a treasure trove of new abilities and powers, enabling you to unleash devastating attacks. As you continue to grow in strength and skill, transform into an indomitable force of nature, capable of bending the very elements to your will.

Gameplay Tips

1. Collect experience and items; they serve as your strategic cards.
2. Strengthen and level up your weapons for increased effectiveness.
3. Customize weapons through diverse upgrade paths for tactical advantage.
4. Upgrade and refund power-ups to optimize your combat strategy.
5. Experience thrilling animated super attacks that deliver goosebumps in the heat of battle.


The excitement doesn't end there!


Spellbound Survivors promises more than just thrilling battles; it represents a system called the Legend Bar meter, a decisive factor in overcoming the Overlord Wizard. Choose your moves wisely, fill the meter strategically, and ascend as the ultimate survivor in the magical realms.

Are you ready to turn the pages of destiny?

The time has come to answer its call and embrace the spellbinding battle that awaits!

title: Project Wunderwaffe Soundtrack: Special Edition
description:
Project Wunderwaffe Soundtrack: Special Edition

The Project Wunderwaffe Soundtrack: Special Edition compilation was made to celebrate the first anniversary of the release of the Project Wunderwaffe game.

It's also a gesture to gamers who wish to listen to all of the musical material that makes up the game's music.

Pieces on the soundtrack are minimalistic, atmospheric, and a little decadent in style. These, among other things, give the Project Wunderwaffe game its characteristic and unique atmosphere.

This OST: Special Edition is a companion piece to Project Wunderwaffe, a game set in World War II reality that is one-of-a-kind in terms of graphics and sound design.

We are happy to be able to share it with you.

Have fun with the album!

title: JR EAST Train Simulator: Shin-etsu Line (Naoetsu to Niigata) E129-0 series
description:
The Shin-etsu Line connects Takasaki Station in Takasaki City, Gunma Prefecture with Niigata Station in Niigata City, Niigata Prefecture.
In the past, a single line connected Takasaki Station to Niigata Station, but with the opening of the Shinkansen line to Nagano (now Hokuriku Shinkansen) in October 1997, the line between Yokokawa Station and Karuizawa Station, which runs parallel to the Shinkansen line, was discontinued. At that time, the remaining line between Karuizawa Station and Shinonoi Station was also transferred to Shinano Railway. In March 2015, the Hokuriku Shinkansen line extension between Nagano and Kanazawa stations opened for service, and management of the line between Nagano and Naoetsu stations was also transferred to Shinano Railway and Echigo TOKImeki Railway.
Currently, the Shin-etsu Line operating as JR EAST has three sections: between Takasaki Station and Yokokawa Station, between Shinonoi Station and Nagano Station, and between Naoetsu Station and Niigata Station. This DLC includes the section between Naoetsu Station and Niigata Station.
Omigawa(青海川) Station, located on the way to the station, is known as a station adjacent to the sea, along with Umi-Shibaura Station on the Tsurumi Line and Rikuzen-Otsuka Station on the Senseki Line, where you can watch the sun set over the Sea of Japan from the platform.The train runs along the seaside section of the Sea of Japan between Naoetsu Station and Kashiwazaki Station, and between Kashiwazaki Station and Niigata Station, it runs through the rural landscape that symbolizes Niigata as a rice-producing region.

Highlights

  • The section running along the beach where you can see the sandy beach/Kakizaki Station - Yoneyama Station
  • Tunnel of the old railway line seen immediately after exiting Yoneyama Station/Yoneyama Station - Kasashima Station
  • Stations adjacent to the Sea of Japan / Omigawa Station
  • Kujiranami Beach seen just before arriving at Kujiranami Station / Omigawa Station - Kujiranami Station
  • Running through mountainous areas and tunnel sections/Kitajo Station - Tsukayama Station
  • Crossing the Shinano River, the longest river in Japan / Raikoji Station - Maekawa Station
  • Scenery of the railroad town of Niitsu / Furutsu Station - Satsukino Station
    Before arriving at Niitsu Station, the pull-in line from the Niitsu Works of the General Rolling Stock Works seen on the left side of the train, and the Yamanote Line E235 Series stopping at Niitsu Station.
    The turntable and snow dumping maintenance cars seen after departure from Niitsu Station.
  • Series 115 and E257 detained at the Niigata Rolling Stock Center / Echigo-Ishiyama Station - Niigata Station.

    Route Information

    • Section: Shin-etsu Line Outbound Naoetsu ⇒ Niigata
    • Total length: 136.3 km
    • Number of Stations: 42
    • Security equipment: ATS-Ps/ATS-P

    Train schedules that can be operated

    • Train Number：1327M
    • Type/Destination: Local train to Nagaoka
    • Section where you can drive: Naoetsu to Nagaoka
    • Type of train: Series E129, 4 cars
    • Responsible for real voice train announcements: Niigata train crew depot

    • Train Number：1323M
    • Type/Destination: Local train to Niigata
    • Section where you can drive: Kashiwazaki to Niigata
    • Type of train: Series E129, 4 cars
    • Responsible for real voice train announcements: Niigata train crew depot

    • Train Number：431M
    • Type/Destination: Local train to Niigata
    • Section where you can drive: Nagaoka to Niigata
    • Type of train: Series E129, 4 cars
    • Responsible for real voice train announcements: Niigata train crew depot

    • Train Number：3481M
    • Type/Destination: Rapid train to Niigata
    • Section where you can drive: Nagaoka to Niigata
    • Type of train: Series E129, 4 cars
    • Responsible for real voice train announcements: Niigata train crew depot

    • Train Number：2523M
    • Type/Destination: Local train to Niigata
    • Section where you can drive: Niitsu to Niigata
    • Type of train: Series E129, 4 cars
    • Responsible for real voice train announcements: Niigata train crew depot

title: Enci's Solution
description:
Exiled by humans centuries ago, the Aeons are confined to the desolate underground. Their village is safe, but beyond the gates, danger lurks at every corner, and not everyone can be trusted.

No one has left the village before, except for you.

title: Underground Waifus TCG
description:
Welcome to Underground Waifus: Dive into the Future of TCG multiplayer with PVP Battles. Play for free this CCG and battler card game and compete, achieve quests and earn free rewards!

The universe of Underground Waifus takes place in the future, corrupted by the scarcity of materials, money: stardust, and the desire for power. An eternal war between different races and more than 9 factions. The gameplay merges several themes: cyberpunk and manga, anime waifus cards based in a post-apocalyptic future.

Underground Waifus is more than just a TCG, CCG, or JJC. It's the dawn of a new era of TCG gaming. If you are tired of traditional Card PVP games, enjoy battling in a vast Battle Arena CCG with players worldwide.

One of the main sources of innovation is that it proposes a circular economy model that combines F2P (Free to Play) in that TCG (Trading Card Game), we’re shifting gears to warp speed!

Can you create a top deck building strategy? There are several combat modes in this card F2P collecting action game:

PVE CCG training available in the F2P mobile and PC version.

PVP Battler Card version with a game pass, winning player gets all.

PVP Player Battle Card Battler version of winning ELO will determine who is the winner of each SEASON.

That JJC trading card game is focused on a competitive side, with an easy PVP (player vs player) battles game with no barriers to entry and hybrid F2P for all players!

FEATURES of an awesome CCG game based on a TCG game:

TCG and CCG Fusion: Enjoy the flavor of the card battles both Trading Card Games and Collectible Card Games with an awesome deck builder.


Deck building Dynamics: Conquer all factions, strategy and deck builder here is that fun but with cards!

Join us in crafting a tale of strategy, card battles, trading and prosperity in the ever expanding cosmos of Underground Waifus TCG (Trading Card Game).

2023 and 2024 Underground Waifus TCG it is a trademark or registered Jurval Corp (Warlands Corp and Nexxyo company)

title: 田园画境 Pastoral
description:
《Pastoral》is a casual simulation, placement of hang-up + oil painting style healing system placement game.
The breeze is quiet and the sun is fine! Let's get away from the hustle and bustle and enjoy a moment of idyllic beauty in the game.

【Game Play】：
1, planting vegetables and fruits: dozens of vegetable fruit trees for you to plant, upgrade;

2, raising animals: you can raise different animals in the garden, their output content, range of activities, movement performance will give you a different experience;


3, recruit farmers: they will automatically help to harvest vegetables and fruits; They can also be equipped with farm tools to improve their work efficiency; The farmers are tired from their work and need a rest. Don't disturb them.


4, garden decoration: you can plant flowers in the garden, mushrooms, sunflowers, lotus, reed, etc., dozens of different kinds of flowers and plants to enrich your garden scenery;


5, place buildings: fences can resist monsters to steal vegetables and fruits, build nests for animals can make small animals grow faster, scarecrows can drive away crows...


6, learn science and technology: as the level rises, you can aquaculture, fish dock, aircraft automatic fertilization, etc., so that your garden becomes automated, waiting for harvest;


7, small games: catch butterflies, whack-a-mole, drive away monsters, tidy up the countryside, repair damaged fences and buildings, fish farming, tree blessing and other daily care!

title: 造化仙缘 Demo
description:
Treasure of Creation


At the beginning of the universe's exploration, several supreme treasures of creation were born together, each possessing the function of defying the heavens. The ultimate treasure of creation is the creation of heaven and earth, the secret of invading the sun and moon, possessing one's own spiritual intelligence and immortality. As long as a cultivator with the treasure of creation can grow up, they will dominate a certain realm and become the supreme strength. When the owner of the treasure of creation falls, it will escape and cannot be captured, drifting in the vast universe, and then searching for someone who is destined.

Rich Stories


Lucky Hongmengzhu, Lucky Golden Axe, Lucky Lotus, Lucky Wood Leaf... Each Lucky Treasure corresponds to a character's story. They are either beggars from the slums or wealthy ladies living in luxury. In the dark, they were chosen as the treasure of creation and wandered through this treacherous world of cultivation. They either killed each other out of love, family, or friendship, opening a magnificent story of cultivation.

title: Sex Play - Naughty Doctor
description:
ABOUT THE GAME
A quick and dirty game made for your pleasure. Contains visual novel elements and a sex simulation part. You play the role of a doctor who cures his patient's sexual problems.

GAME DESCRIPTION
Sex Play – Naughty Doctor will definitely arouse your senses!

Take your scrub and start your medical consultations.
An attractive young woman comes into your office with an embarrassing issue.
Calm her down and tell her to prepare for a physical examination.
Find the cause of the problem and offer her the right treatment for her condition.

This game presents you sexy characters, steamy stories, and high-quality graphics.

FEATURES

- HD renders
- HD animations

title: Once Upon a Rogue's Tale
description:
"Once Upon a Rogue's Tale” combines strategic roguelike deckbuilding with the luck of the dice. Roll the dice and trade them in battle to play your cards. Dice also allow you to unleash powerful character abilities to your advantage.



Out of combat, you'll encounter events that will confront you with tough decisions. The choices you make will affect how the story unfolds, which will be written down in your personal storybook.

The fairytale worlds have mixed...

Little Red Riding Hood, Jack and the Beanstalk and The Frog Prince find themselves in an adventurous tangle of fairytales. Choose one of the classic characters, make your own decisions and influence the course of the story. Team up with strong allies and collect magical items to help you on your way through the colorful fairytale world.

Strategical deepness through positioning

Positioning is especially important in battles with multiple opponents and adds strategic depth to the game. Use certain abilities to influence the position of your characters and apply special effects to your opponents to be able to attack them from anywhere.

Battle between good and evil

Each character has their own motivations that have led them to the good or evil side. But ultimately, the decision is yours: will former villains become new friends or will you turn the entire fairytale world against you? Your actions determine the fate of the fairytale characters and blur the lines between friend and foe.




  • Revisit your favourite fairytales in a wholesome anime inspired artstyle
  • Experience randomly generated runs with high replayability
  • Gather helpful allies and collect powerful items
  • Use cards and dice to defeat your opponents
  • Master the positioning mechanic to unlock a new level of strategy

title: W.I.T.S: INITIATION
description:
Embark on a thrilling journey into the world of cyber espionage and intrigue with W.I.T.S: INITIATION. As a new member of the elite cybercrime-fighting agency, W.I.T.S, you'll delve into a web of mystery, betrayal, and high-stakes cyber warfare.

Earn your place with Director Angela Bishop and her team of skilled agents by solving a series of puzzles to prove that you belong with the best of the best. With your wit, analytical mind, and technological prowess, navigate through a series of complex clues, crack intricate puzzles, and unravel the secrets hidden in the digital realm.

Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative filled with unexpected twists and turns, where your skill in uncovering the truth could mean the difference between victory and defeat. Are you ready to take on the role of a cyber sentinel and defend against the looming threat of cybercrime? The fate of the digital world rests in your hands.

Experience the mind bending puzzles and suspense of W.I.T.S: INITIATION today. It's time to join the fight and become the ultimate cyber defender.

GAMEPLAY


W.I.T.S: INITIATION is a logic puzzle game where you have to some puzzles to progress further in the system. As you learn more about the other agents and the agency, you will uncover something troubling at W.I.T.S, it looks like one or more of the agents aren't quite what we think. Can you solve all the puzzles and get to the bottom of the mystery?

  • Solve 50 fun and challenging logic puzzles!
  • Figure out the larger mystery about the mole at the agency!
  • Explore the system and learn as much as you can about your fellow agents!



Get to know these agents and uncover all there is to know about them. Find out all there is to know about them, figure out who is safe to trust and who is looking out for themselves.

PLAY TOGETHER!


This is a perfect game to sit together and play with a friend, figure out the puzzles as a team and work together to uncover the mysteries at the agency. Or challenge a friend and compete to see who can get the highest score and the answers correct at the end of the game.

title: SAND LAND - Custom Vehicle Colors (3 Types)
description:
Customize vehicles with 3 special colors. Colors can be applied to all customizable vehicles.

*Vehicle color customization will be available after unlocking Paint Shop in Spino.

title: Sporeborn Dark
description:
Without realizing what is happening, a prisoner wakes up in a prison cell and finds himself in a dark labyrinth of corridors and rooms inhabited by mysterious and terrifying creatures that lurk around every corner.

Every step the prisoner takes is met with an unsettling silence, and every sound echoes ominously, leaving him in a state of constant uncertainty and fear.

To survive and escape this dangerous environment, the prisoner must carefully search for necessities, tools, and even weapons that may offer a glimmer of hope or at least prolong the desperate struggle for survival.

Will you manage to find a way out in this maze or will you become another victim in this nightmare?



Aside from the dangerous creatures that may be waiting for you around every corner. Dark, cramped spaces where it's easy to get lost instill a fear that will keep you from keeping your sanity to get out of the place.



Will you be able to reconstruct the story of events by exploring locations and studying rare messages from those who were at the center of the incident?



  • Top-down horror with pitch black darkness all around. Light is your best friend.
  • Explore the rooms to find items that will help you live longer and maybe find out what happened here.
  • Mutated creatures that are eager to take over your system.
  • An oppressive atmosphere where every rustle is frightening.
  • Random location generation for each new attempt to survive, creating a kind of maze. Will you be able to find your way out of it?

title: HOCKEY HEROES Demo
description:
Get ready to rock the outdoor rink with the new adrenaline-pumping arcade hockey video game ODR Hockey Heroes! Featuring ultra-smooth 'pick-up-and-play' controls that'll have you scoring goals and laying hitz like a true legend.



Strap on your skates and dive headfirst into our Shinny Mode Demo for ODR Hockey Heroes! Pick your jerseys then take turns drafting your team from a diverse roster of stat-driven characters. Play a single game or battle it out in a best-of-seven series with all your friends!

title: Dark City: Kyiv Collector's Edition
description:
Friendly Fox, the studio behind the mysterious Dark City series, returns with the next intriguing chapter, Dark City: Kyiv!

When an investigation of a suspected spiritualist fraud comes up empty, events unfold to reveal a much darker and more complex underbelly of the magic city of Kyiv. You'll play as a renowned detective in a city of secrets, paranormal circumstances, and mistrust as you struggle to learn who to trust among your friends and locals. Things take an unexpected turn when your investigation points to the existence of supernatural inhabitants of Kyiv and someone or something that wants them out of the way. With more questions than answers, it's up to you to untangle this dark mystery and save a city on the brink in this mind-bending hidden-object experience!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version.

The Collector's Edition includes:
• Easily navigate the living streets of Kyiv with the handy strategy guide!
• Uncover the mystery of the disappearing magical creatures in the bonus game!
• Download and keep beautiful wallpapers to immerse yourself in magic!
• Bring the adventure home with the exclusive music player!
• Find dozens of bonus hidden objects throughout!
• Tons of collectibles and morphing objects to find!

title: InfestStation
description:
Join Us On Discord


Join us on the Atom Switch Community Discord Server! Check out the sidebar for the link.


Early Access

As this game is releasing in Early Access, that means it is in an incomplete state that will continue to grow and improve over time as we add more features, fixes, and content. As a small indie team, we are excited to develop this game alongside you and utilize your feedback and support to make INFESTSTATION the best it can be!


About the Game



In this dystopian future world, players take on the role of OMICRONIX Corp Recovery technicians sent out to derelict space stations to resolve the interdimensional catastrophes caused by the Faster-Than-Light Crimson Engine drives.

Threatened by otherworldly malevolent forces, players must work together to survive the horrors stalking them as they seek to sever this interdimensional rift and disable the Crimson Drive Cores once and for all.

You've Been Hired to the Recovery Corps!

    ⠀⠀⠀⠀
  • Session-based Multiplayer PvE
    Join up with up to 3 of your friends to board deadly derelict space craft, disable and retrieve the craft's Crimson Core, and make it out alive!
    ⠀⠀⠀⠀
  • Follow OCIX Procedure
    Find and Close Crimson Rips | Expand Your Toolset | Extract The Crimson Core | Get OUT Alive!

  • Stay Alert, Stay Alive
    Keep your head on a swivel and use all of the tools at your disposal - including those scavenged as you explore - to stay alert to danger as you navigate each derelict space station in search of Crimson Rips to close and the Crimson Drive Core to bring back to your docked dropship, the POD.
    ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

Backstory


50 years have passed since the megacorporation OMICRONIX discovered a new technology that could send ships to distant stars in an instant. This FTL Engine was called The Crimson Drive. For decades, OMICRONIX recruited the hopeful and the destitute, launching them into the darkest parts of space to mine asteroids and distant planets.

One By One they All Went Dark.

Powered by unexplained and misunderstood forces, extended operation of the Crimson Drives shattered the boundaries of our dimension, creating a gateway to horror on each ship that used it. The things that crossed over have infested the now-derelict crafts, melding them into nests and hives. While the former crew members and their families are now gone, the dangers of these rifts still remain.

Desperate to reclaim the data recorded during these events, OMICRONIX now tasks their downtrodden workforce with returning to these craft, shutting down the dimensional rifts, and returning with the drive’s Crimson Cores for study.

It’s not easy, and it’s not safe. But someone has to do it…

title: Drive Up
description:
Drive Up

In the world of "Drive Up," you're not just driving; you're embarking on a thrilling journey. Your adventure begins on a mysterious island with only one road leading upward. Your mission is crystal clear: reach the finish line without any tumbles because there are no checkpoints!

The road you navigate is treacherous, filled with unexpected twists, steep inclines, and narrow paths that seem to defy gravity. As you rev your engines and embark on this incredible journey, you'll come to realize that every inch of progress matters.

"Drive Up" is a test of your driving skills, your nerve, and your ability to adapt to an ever-changing landscape. One wrong move could send you tumbling into the abyss below, and there's no safety net to catch you. But remember, in the world of "Drive Up," mistakes are your greatest teachers, and each setback is a chance to learn and grow.

Your car is more than just a machine; it's a reflection of your determination to conquer the heights. Along the way, you'll discover upgrades and power-ups that can give you an edge. Turbo boosts for those heart-pounding moments, reinforced tires for better traction, and even the ability to slow down time when precision is the key to success.

As you ascend, the challenges become increasingly daunting. The island holds its secrets, and you'll uncover hidden paths, shortcuts, and surprises along the way. Each level presents a unique puzzle for you to solve with your wheels and wits.

"Drive Up" is not just a race against gravity; it's a journey of self-discovery. The road to the finish line is paved with determination, patience, and a willingness to face the unknown. There's no telling what awaits you at the pinnacle of this island, but one thing is certain: the only way is up.

Do you have what it takes to conquer "Drive Up" and reach the zenith of this thrilling, gravity-defying adventure?
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation

title: Europa Universalis IV: Utopia Holy Roman Empire Music Pack
description:
Inspired by the sacred aura and secular might of the Holy Roman Empire, this music collection from composer Utopia adds ten new songs to Europa Universalis IV. Drawing on the motifs of Empire, Order, Diplomacy and Piety, these original compositions highlight the vibrancy and majesty of the Holy Roman Empire at the peak of its power in the early modern era.

The songs included in this collection are:

  • Now Rise, My Loyal Subjects
  • A Continuation of Diplomacy
  • Prussian Ambitions
  • Order and Diplomacy
  • Life Under the Shadow Kingdom
  • Election of a Habsburg
  • Autumn in Aachen
  • Ninety-Five Theses
  • Imperial Diet
  • Charlemagne’s Legacy

title: Animal Trail ☆ Girlish Square LOVE+PLUS
description:
STORY


Idol otaku, Nakamori Taiga and the girls of idol group Animal Trail ☆ Girlish Square are back in this series of side stories featuring Haneru and Tetora!

Haneru Route

In search of another way to promote the group, Haneru turns to streaming old games and somehow it actually proved to be a success? Of course she’s doing It for the views (and the fans) but one thing leads to another during a “study” session on old games that Taiga lends to Haneru.

Tetora Route

The seed of understanding her role as an idol begins to sprout within Tetora. She gets both excited and nervous at the prospect of practicing “stage chatter” with Taiga. Taken by surprise with this request, Taiga does what he can to help her out. That resting Tetora face says otherwise though. What will our hero do to smoothly get her talking and smiling for everyone…?

FEATURES

  • Beautiful art by Shiromochi Sakura
  • Magical girl idols with animal ears
  • Fun and engaging story by Oumiya Yuu (NEKO-NIN, DraPri)
  • Full Japanese voice acting (excluding the MC)
  • Kinetic visual novel, there is only a single ending
  • Gallery to revisit favorite CGs and listen to your favorite in game music tracks
  • Ability to favorite specific voice lines

title: Sunken Stones
description:
Sunken Stones is a turn-based Puzzle-Strategy game that immerses you in a world of pirates, cursed treasure, and strategic combat. Lead your crew of misfit pirates across treacherous seas, overcoming powerful foes by outsmarting them on a 5x5 grid. Choose your captain, build your crew, and use your cunning to unlock powerful combos and defeat sea monsters. Can you survive the curse and conquer the seas?

Key Features:


Choose Your Captain: Your journey begins by choosing a captain, each with unique abilities, starting health, and savvy—an essential resource for deploying crewmates. Your captain is the core of your team, as enemies only target them. Pick wisely to suit your playstyle and adapt to the threats ahead!




Build Your Crew: Rescue and recruit crewmates with unique skills and abilities to bolster your pirate force. Every crewmate brings something special to the fight—whether it’s unleashing devastating combo chains or supporting your captain in creative ways. Manage your crew carefully, as you can make crewmates walk the plank to bring in new recruits with even stronger potential!




Master Elemental Combat: Both captains and crewmates are aligned to one of three elements: Steel, Smoke, or Salt, each with its own mechanics and strategies:

  • Steel: The aggressive option, Steel focuses on boosting attack power, controlling positioning on the board, and utilizing extra savvy as a resource.
  • Smoke: The element of combos and trickery. Smoke uses ammo and can apply the Smoking debuff. Smoke excels in crowd control, affecting all enemies on the board and using knockback abilities.
  • Salt: For tactical minds, Salt specializes in controlling the battlefield, using health as a resource, and employing the Submerge mechanic, preventing enemies from attacking or being attacked. With careful planning, Salt can turn the tide of battle with precise strikes.




Collect Cursed Treasure and Manage the Curse: As you gather cursed treasure, your crew grows increasingly afflicted. Deploying afflicted crew members raises your curse meter, and if full by the end of a round, all Creeps on the board become stronger.

Dive into the world of Sunken Stones—where strategic thinking, careful crew management, and a sharp eye for combos will guide you through danger. Will you rise above the curse and become the master of the high seas? Or will your crew succumb to the sinister power of cursed treasure? The ocean awaits your command!

title: Doors24
description:
Get overpowered and destroy waves of enemies
Doors24 is about getting progressively stronger as you build your defenses. Fill your screen with rockets, lightning and explosions as you create your powerups and see the damage rising!



With Doors24, we tried to take the elements that made you feel strong, while giving the player a variety of options that they can choose to grow. Build. Upgrade. Create!

Will you be able to protect your pc long enough? Will you try to obliterate your enemies as quick as you can, ou will you try to slow them down to a halt? Each new wave comes with increasing enemies and increasing strength, so prove that you can become even stronger!

  • Build unique towers
  • Develop your own powerups
  • Survive the virus onslaught
  • A life-enriching experience(probably)

We are planning to release Early Acess in Q1 of 2024 ;D!

title: Vector Assault 2 Demo
description:
Battle waves of enemies in this enhanced sequel with better visuals and improved twin stick shooter gameplay.

In Vector Assault 2 engage enemies in exciting arenas and try to achieve the high score. Survive waves of enemies using various types of ships and multiple power-ups.

The demo version contains a limited set of features from the full version of Vector Assault 2.

  • 9 challenge levels
  • 2 playable ships each with their own main and sub weapon
  • 2 unique power-ups to help you eliminate enemies.\

title: Paper Play VR
description:
*Beep Boop* Do you want to come over to play? We could either just chill in my cardboard castle or give our best to break all the online highscores. The more, the merrier! Bring up to 4 friends and we can all play some games together! :)

Stone Skipper
It's like golf, but with a stone that you are skipping on the water. Make the stones bounce on the surface in order to hit the pole at the end of each course!

Ghost Hunt
In this paranoia simulator, you need to reveal spooky ghosts with a flashlight in order to shoot them. But be aware that there might always be another ghost hiding in the dark - ever waiting to finally blow out your last candle!

Ice Cream Taster
It's that weird game, where you have a very long tongue and try to lick ice cream. But attention! You are allergic to some flavors, so your tongue might literally get burned, if you are too greedy!

Join the Party for all the additional minigames that are coming soon…
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Early Access

title: Keepers of Astraela Demo
description:
Eva has a world inside her head: the land of Astraela, where Darkness and Corrupted beasts threaten eternal doom. Vivid dreams have given her four books as an up-and-coming author, but when undead fiends appear on Earth for a killing spree, she is caught in the crossfire between dreams and reality.

These creatures shouldn't exist outside the pages of her books—and neither should Emrys, the fictional hero who slips in from the shadows to tell her that Astraela is facing its ultimate destruction. With little information and a lot at stake, the player must guide Eva's actions in order to decipher what's going on as reality crumbles around her.



  • 60,000+ word count with multiple endings
  • 5 character sprites that preview the diverse cast
  • 1 male love interest who can’t stop setting things on fire
  • 1 female love interest who’s the best friend a girl could ask for
  • High-quality background art that explores the quaint streets of Havenwood
  • Two types of choices, some that affect the storyline and character relations, others that are just for fun
  • An immersive score and sound effects that bring the story to life
  • …and one seriously messed up squirrel

title: Escapen't Demo
description:
Escapen’t Is My Magnum Opus.

The perfect escape room.

You will never escape it because there is no escape. It is essentially the only escape room you will ever need to play, because you can practically play it forever without getting anywhere.

This is the demo, so escape is even less possible in this version!

An Escape Room Like No Other

Every puzzle in my masterpiece is a work of genius (my genius, of course) that will have you scratching your tiny little head, desperately trying to make sense of a world far too complex for your limited intellect. You will have to think outside the box - but, uh, we both know that's not going to happen.

You Are Not Alone

As you flail helplessly, I’ll be right there with you, offering my expert guidance over the intercoms, reminding you just how utterly trapped you are.

My velvety, intellectual voice will caress your ears, a rare treat in itself, truly worth the price of admission (which, by the way, happens to be your very soul).

If you hear any other voices, then it must be something with your head and not someone in the walls.

Over 50 Unique Spiders!

These little critters are everywhere. No matter how hard I try, they keep sneaking in. If you see one, by all means, squash it—though I doubt you’ll even manage that. But please, for the love of my genius, don’t pick them up and try to have a conversation. They’re not interested in your nonsense.

Free Coffee (You'll Need It)

Go ahead, drink all the coffee your weak little heart desires. You’ll need it. I’ve generously provided an endless supply, so you can keep trying (and failing) over and over again to escape. Oh, and if you happen to find any of my cups or mugs lying around, be a dear and bring them back to me.

Endless Puzzles, Endless Fun

Each and every puzzle in Escapen't is a masterpiece of complexity, designed to keep you entertained (or hopelessly frustrated) for all eternity. I have crafted these ingenious challenges to make sure your fun (or misery) never ends.

You’ll keep going in circles, but don’t worry—I’m having the time of my life watching you flounder. Fun forever? Maybe for me. For you? Good luck.

title: Elemental Mage Defense
description:
Master three potent spells: Earth, Fire, and Water.
Engage in strategic battles against invading monsters of opposing elemental types: Fire, Earth, and Water.
  • Earth Spell (Geomancy): Unleash the earthen energies to counter the relentless waves of WaterMonsters, turning their tides into mere puddles.
  • Fire Spell (Pyromancy): Call upon the fiery heavens to scorch the advancing EarthMonsters, turning their solid resolve into ashes.
  • Water Spell (Hydromancy): Conjure torrents of water to douse the flaming assault of the FireMonsters, quelling their fiery onslaught with a splash of reality.
Evolve your strategies, and rotate your spells to defend your station and in turn survive.


Elemental Mage Defense beckons you to immerse yourself in a vibrant and dynamic world brimming with elemental magic and untold perils. In this groundbreaking shoot 'em up adventure, you take on the role of a valiant mage caught amidst an unforeseen invasion that threatens to engulf your homeland. With the weight of your kingdom on your shoulders, you embark on a legendary journey, from defending tranquil villages to safeguarding the mighty fortress that stands as the last beacon of hope against the advancing dark forces.

In this journey of magic and heroism, strategy meets action at every turn. Harness the powers of Earth, Fire, and Water to protect your realm from the elemental beasts hell-bent on chaos and destruction. With a dynamic rock-paper-scissors battle system, every encounter calls for strategic planning and quick reflexes.



An Engrossing Journey:

Start in the scenic plains, defending peaceful villages from the impending doom.
Work your way back to your castle, the heart of your kingdom, preparing for a grand showdown.
Experience a rich narrative filled with twists and monumental battles.
Visually Stunning Environments:

Traverse through a vivid world crafted with breathtaking detail.
From idyllic villages to grandiose castles, each setting offers a unique backdrop for battle.
Bonus Game Modes:

Dimensional Shift: Switch gears with a 3D FPS shooter mode, adding a fresh perspective to your adventure.
Dodgeball: Take a break from battle with a high-speed asteroid dodging game, testing your agility and precision.
Wall of Death: Face wave after wave of enemies in an ultimate test of endurance and might.
Danger Room: load up an endless environment tracking Time Survived, Monsters Killed, and Score.

A World Ever-Growing
Dive into a continuously evolving landscape, teeming with potential and opportunities for further exploration and challenges. As we steer Elemental Mage Defense into the future, anticipate periodic expansions and add-ons that promise to enrich the lore, introduce new terrains and adversaries, and expand the gameplay dynamics. Your adventure is bound to grow, offering fresh narratives and challenges, marking an unending journey in a world that grows with the community's passion and enthusiasm.

Elemental Mage Defense is more than a game; it's an expedition into a world where your wits are your greatest weapon, and your courage is tested at every corner. Prepare to immerse yourself in a tale where every decision carves your legacy.

Prepare to embrace your destiny as the elemental mage in Elemental Mage Defense, where adventure beckons the brave. Add to your wishlist now, and be the first to step into a world where magic is your mightiest ally.

title: Incubus - Sounds of E9 - Radio Soundtrack
description: Listen to all the radio tracks featured in Incubus. Sounds of E9 is presented by DJ Zoe Cox and includes all day and night tracks from the game.

title: We Are Gladiators Demo
description: We Are Gladiators is a challenging turn-based RPG roguelite game about commanding and managing a company of gladiators. This demo gives you to access to the first act of the game: Breedmarsh. Customize your starting character 'The Kid', do battle in the Breedmarsh arena, recruit and manage your gladiators in the town, and defeat the first boss!

title: At the Edge of the World
description:
A lone fisherman sits at the edge of the world. Something stirs inside of him. It wants to be fed.

At the Edge of the World is a micro-incremental game meant to be played in a single afternoon, maybe while you work and need a small distraction from time to time. Maybe while you are fishing and crave for immersion.


  • About 2-5 hours of multitaskable entertainement
  • Incremental gameplay goodness that tickles your dopamine emitters
  • Manage multiple resources and improve your fishing arsenal
  • Automate your clicking with upgrades
  • Beautiful narration (that you can toggle off if you'd like)
  • A deeper meaning on life and finality (maybe)
  • Some secrets? Hmmm


  • A realistic simulation of fishing

title: Pinball Spire
description:
Pinball Spire is a game unlike any other, a pinballvania blending together classic genres - and pinball. Conquer the titular spire as a brave, plucky little pinball called Pip, destined to step into the plunger and explore the inner chambers of a mysterious spire that appeared in their world overnight.

Enter the spire. Inside is a strange pinball maze, full of secrets to unlock, enemies to bump off, and contraptions for the intrepid little ball to interact with. It's not just all flippers and physics either - brave little Pip has special abilities that will play a crucial role in the journey through the spire, towards the challenge lurking at its peak.

  • Welcome to the world of Pinballvania! A fusion of arcade pinball mechanics with platforming, puzzles, and exploration—drawing inspiration from retro action-adventure games

  • Elaborate pinball levels to explore, combining traditional pinball tables with atmospheric dungeons and passageways to explore.

  • Mana-powered pinball abilities enable unorthodox ways to interact with the environment.

  • Fun accessories to collect and equip to customize Pip’s appearance!
